isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - SINGLE REDUCTION, SINGLE DRIVE AXLES: EATON - INSTALL - DIFFERENTIAL AND RING GEAR ASSEMBLY

note.para: Lubricate bearings during the following assembly procedures.

step1.para: Place ring gear and differential assembly in carrier. Carefully lower the assembly until bearing cones rest on carrier ( Figure 31).

figure.caption: Figure 31. Lower Assembly Until Bearing Cones Rest on Carrier

step1.para: Install bearing cups at both sides of differential case. Install bearing adjusters and bearing caps. Install bolts and flat washers.
Tighten bearing bolts finger-tight. If this is difficult, use hand wrench.

caution.para: When installing bearing caps and adjusters, exercise care not to cross threads.

note.para: The assembly is now ready for adjustment of differential bearing preload, ring gear backlash and gear tooth contact.
